GSD.description:
ext4: don't BUG if someone dirty pages without asking ext4 first

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit a0856764dc1276ad2dc7891288c2e9246bf11a37. For more details please see the references link.
